courses.title: Introduction to Computer Science
courses.description: An introduction to the basics of computer science, including programming concepts, data structures, and algorithms.

courses.title: Web Development with HTML, CSS, and JavaScript
courses.description: Learn how to create responsive, modern websites using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript.

courses.title: Data Science Fundamentals
courses.description: An introduction to data analysis and visualization using Python and popular data science libraries.

courses.title: Java Programming
courses.description: Learn the basics of object-oriented programming using the Java programming language.

courses.title: Introduction to Artificial Intelligence
courses.description: An overview of the field of artificial intelligence, including machine learning, natural language processing, and computer vision.

courses.title: Android App Development
courses.description: Learn how to create mobile apps for the Android platform using Java and the Android SDK.

courses.title: iOS App Development
courses.description: Learn how to create mobile apps for the iOS platform using Swift and the iOS SDK.

courses.title: Python for Data Analysis
courses.description: Learn how to use Python for data analysis, including data cleaning, manipulation, and visualization.

courses.title: Database Design and SQL
courses.description: Learn how to design and implement databases using SQL.
